## 1. Introduction

Pacbio short intro

We will create a pipeline to analyse Pacbio data.

Not all bioinformaticians have a powerful machine to play around with.
For that region we will impose on a few restriction.
This will force us to think of a way to solve the problem with what we have.
Here I will show you some of the ways you can work around such restriction using Snakemake.
The aim of these tutorial is for beginners
